data.name: Shachibato! President, It's Time for Battle! Deluxe Contents
data.detailed_description:
In celebration for the release of the game a special deluxe content is available!

Deluxe content contains the following.

・Digital Art Book
22 pages of digital illustration and development assets!

・Original Digital Soundtrack
41 digital music along with a track sheet!

*After purchase of this DLC the above contents will be downloaded to the folder directory "Deluxe" on your PC.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: In celebration for the release of the game a special deluxe content that contains an 22 page digital art book and a digital soundtrack is available!

fullgame.name: Shachibato! President, It's Time for Battle! Maju Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1 GB or better graphics card that can support DirectX 12.0 or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card

Minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
